claim_card.claim: This paper establishes a reproducible, control-based discrimination outcome and methodological claim, but does not establish a new cosmological model or a unique physical mechanism; broader nulls, larger cohorts, and independent replication are required next.
claim_card.test_hook: Extend the pipeline to additional null families and reconstructions, increase cohort sizes, and perform independent replication; assess whether the reported morphology-sensitive separation persists.

source.locator: p7 (what is and is not established); p9â€“10 (limitations and next steps)
source.note: Conservative scope boundary and explicit falsification path
